message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,200,000.  It's a valuable asset, and I'm confident it will be worth even more to you.  Let's talk.
Hello Alice, thank you for considering my offer. I understand the value of your product, but I am only able to pay up to $950,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm not quite there yet. I'm willing to come down to $1,050,000. This is a fair price considering the value of the product. Let's see if we can reach an agreement.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $1,000,000 for your product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
